requirements: Diploma or Full Technician Certifiacte (FTC) in Agricultural Engineering, Hydrogeology and Water Well Drilling, Water Quality Laboratory Technology, Irrigation Engineering or Water Resources Engineering with an average of “B’’ or a minimum GPA of 3.0.
In addition, an applicant must have a minimum of “D” grade in two science subjects and a minimum of “D” grade in Mathematics at O-Level.
